QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: MessageLogs can reside in data files, on specially allocated storage areas such as disks or memory, or output as raw I/O streams. In fact, a single Log may use each of these mechanisms to output or capture its contents. The LogInStorage association describes a Log located in a specially allocated portion of a StorageExtent. The offset of the Log, within the Extent, is defined using a property of the association, StartingOffset.

QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: The MessageLog located within the Extent.

QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: StartingOffset indicates where in the Extent that the Log begins.
